body_html: ctypes.util.find_library doesn't return library name, but a full path, including the file (aka pathname). Maybe a better fix would be to descend into the parent directory of what we currently get? If that doesn't work, we can fall back to nvcc. I don't want to make it a primary method of selecting CUDA_HOME, because e.g. I don't have nvcc in my PATH.

body: `ctypes.util.find_library` doesn't return library name, but a full path, including the file (aka pathname). Maybe a better fix would be to descend into the parent directory of what we currently get? If that doesn't work, we can fall back to `nvcc`. I don't want to make it a primary method of selecting `CUDA_HOME`, because e.g. I don't have `nvcc` in my `PATH`.
